channel.title: Switch to drop
channel.description:
i'm using insidiaxv2 and when you are randomly click an item, it has a chance to randomly drop..
other explanations: Sometimes when I try to equip a item it just randomly drops it..? I've looked through the wearitem code but I can't find anything that would cause this complication. Does anyone know where I need to look for this?
other: Hey guys , I'am using InsidiaX v2 sometimes when u equip items they drop on the ground lets say we are trying to wield rune 2h And instead option Wield it shows option drop for some reason don't know how to explain it better ;/ Does any1 haz fix for this badly need this
and last one: Okay say you're pking, you switch to a different armor set or maybe even eat food, randomly it drops the item you click. Anyone know a fix? Please reply, much appreciated.

item.title: Switch to drop
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

i’m using insidiaxv2 and when you are randomly click an item, it has a chance to randomly drop…

other explanations: Sometimes when I try to equip a item it just randomly drops it…?
I’ve looked through the wearitem code but I can’t find anything that would cause this complication.
Does anyone know where I need to look for this?

other: Hey guys , I’am using InsidiaX v2 sometimes when u equip items they drop on the ground lets say we are trying to wield rune 2h And instead option Wield it shows option drop for some reason don’t know how to explain it better ;/ Does any1 haz fix for this badly need this

and last one: Okay say you’re pking, you switch to a different armor set or maybe even eat food, randomly it drops the item you click. Anyone know a fix? Please reply, much appreciated.
